downloadTitle: MapPoint 2004 and Streets and Trips 2004 Construction Update
downloadDescription: Download the construction information update to keep your maps current.
detailsSection: Download the construction information update to keep the road construction projects information of your maps current in Streets and Trips 2004.
installInstructionSection:
1. Close MapPoint or Streets & Trips.

  2. Click the Download link to start the download.
  3. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  4. Save the file in the Data folder, located where you installed the program files for MapPoint or Streets & Trips. I.e. C:\Program Files\Microsoft MapPoint\Data\.
  5. Restart MapPoint or Streets & Trips.
